title: Scar Tissue
content:
verse1:
Scar tissue that I wish you saw, (you) Sarcastic mister know-it-all.
Close your eyes and I'll kiss you, 'cause with the birds I'll share (lonely view).

chorus1:
With the birds I'll share this lonely viewin'
With the birds I'll share this lonely viewin'

verse2:
Push me up against the wall, (you) Young Kentucky girl in a push-up bra.
Fallin' all over myself to lick your heart and taste your health ('cause)

chorus2:
With the birds I'll share this lonely viewin'
With the birds I'll share this lonely viewin'
With the birds I'll share this lonely view

verse3:
Blood loss in a bathroom stall, (with) a southern girl with a scarlet drawl (way to speak).
I wave goodbye to ma and pa 'cause with the birds I'll share (this lonely view)

chorus1:

verse4:
(I'm) soft spoken with a broken jaw, (but I still) step outside, but not to brawl.
And autumn's sweet, we call it fall.
I'll make it to the moon if I have to crawl (and)

chorus2:

verse1:

chorus2:

unique_lines.key: Scar tissue that I wish you saw, (you) Sarcastic mister know-it-all.
Close your eyes and I'll kiss you, 'cause with the birds I'll share (lonely view).
With the birds I'll share this lonely viewin'
Push me up against the wall, (you) Young Kentucky girl in a push-up bra.
Fallin' all over myself to lick your heart and taste your health ('cause)
With the birds I'll share this lonely view
Blood loss in a bathroom stall, (with) a southern girl with a scarlet drawl (way to speak).
I wave goodbye to ma and pa 'cause with the birds I'll share (this lonely view)
(I'm) soft spoken with a broken jaw, (but I still) step outside, but not to brawl.
And autumn's sweet, we call it fall.
I'll make it to the moon if I have to crawl (and)

lines: Scar tissue that I wish you saw, (you) Sarcastic mister know-it-all.
Close your eyes and I'll kiss you, 'cause with the birds I'll share (lonely view).

a.txt: Scar tissue that I wish you saw, (you) Sarcastic mister know-it-all.

b.txt: Close your eyes and I'll kiss you, 'cause with the birds I'll share (lonely view).

data.value: The lyrics express the idea of struggling with something and wishing for someone to understand and be close despite the obstacles.
The lyrics demonstrate the expression of love and the need to be close and to be kissed by someone special.

lines: With the birds I'll share this lonely viewin'
With the birds I'll share this lonely viewin'

a.txt: With the birds I'll share this lonely viewin'

b.txt: With the birds I'll share this lonely viewin'

data.value: The lyrics express a desire to share and experience moments with someone and to be in their company, showing a deep friendship bond between the two.
The need to be close to such a person, despite the lonely moments, shows a strong loyalty between the two.

lines: Push me up against the wall, (you) Young Kentucky girl in a push-up bra.
Fallin' all over myself to lick your heart and taste your health ('cause)

a.txt: Push me up against the wall, (you) Young Kentucky girl in a push-up bra.

b.txt: Fallin' all over myself to lick your heart and taste your health ('cause)

data.value: The idea of pushing boundaries and making decisions that will affect the future is present in the lyrics.
The idea of wanting to make a difference, even a small one, is present in the lyrics.

The need to have faith in the journey, despite the loneliness, is shown in the lyrics.

lines: Blood loss in a bathroom stall, (with) a southern girl with a scarlet drawl (way to speak).
I wave goodbye to ma and pa 'cause with the birds I'll share (this lonely view)

a.txt: Blood loss in a bathroom stall, (with) a southern girl with a scarlet drawl (way to speak).

b.txt: I wave goodbye to ma and pa 'cause with the birds I'll share (this lonely view)

data.value: The lyrics express a sense of loss at leaving a familiar place and knowing that there is an uncertain future ahead.
The idea of having a purpose in life and a mission to pursue is present in the lyrics.

lines: (I'm) soft spoken with a broken jaw, (but I still) step outside, but not to brawl.
And autumn's sweet, we call it fall.
I'll make it to the moon if I have to crawl (and)

data.value: The lyrics express the idea of struggling and finding strength in the face of adversity by continuing to strive for one's goals.
